Articles.Content: Hello folks, because I'm under no illusion that I haven't got the faintest idea how to go about doing this. Is anyone interested in elevating Beyond Home to the next level? Or perhaps able to point me in the direction of some literature/supporting material for how to go about implementing the volumetrics.

I've never made any configs for volumetrics, but I can find a few people who have! OneSaltyPringle made a config for OPM, ProximaCentauri-Star on Github made a config for Kcalbeloh, Sushut made configs for his mod Infinite Discoveries, and balllisticfox0 made configs for RSS. hopefully at least one of them can help you out lmao

Edit: Blackrack has a wiki for EVE as well, which explains how the configs for volumetric clouds works. So that would be a good place to start. Other than that, you could just look through the configs yourself or use the in-game cloud editor to test things out.
